intro: Five club classics. One game. Endless fun on Nintendo Switch™!
description:
Club Sports Collection – Your All-In-One Lounge Experience!

Step into the ultimate game lounge — right on Nintendo Switch™!
Club Sports Collection brings together the world’s favorite bar and club games in one stylish, realistic experience.

Challenge yourself or your friends in thrilling matches of pool, snooker, darts, bowling, and foosball — all recreated with authentic physics, intuitive controls, and stunning 3D visuals. Whether you’re sinking the 8-ball, striking for a perfect 300, hitting the bullseye, or scoring the winning goal, every game feels true-to-life and packed with fun!

Customize tables, cues, darts, balls, and more to create your perfect setup. Play solo to master your precision, or invite friends for exciting local multiplayer duels.

Features:

* Five classic club games: Pool, Snooker, Darts, Bowling & Foosball
* Realistic physics and immersive 3D graphics
* Single-player and local multiplayer modes
* Dozens of customization options for cues, balls, boards, and tables
* Smooth Joy-Con™ controls for a natural gameplay feel

Grab Joy-Con™, step up to the table, and prove your skills —
Club Sports Collection turns Nintendo Switch™ into the ultimate social playground!
